item.text: Then I saw a beast coming up out of the sea. It had ten horns and seven heads, and on its horns were ten diadem crowns, and on its heads a blasphemous name.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3917" class="">leopard</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> were <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="715" class="">bear’s</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> was <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3023" class="">lion’s</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>. The<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1404" class="">dragon</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">the beast</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="1849">authority to rule</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1520" class="">One</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">the beast’s</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st> <st data-num="5613">appeared</st> to have been <st data-num="4969">killed</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="2288" class="">lethal</st> <st data-num="4127" class="">wound</st> had been <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">world</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">followed</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> in <st data-num="2296">amazement</st>;

they <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiped</st> the <st data-num="1404" class="">dragon</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he had <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1849">ruling authority</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiped</st> the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> too, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>: “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> is <st data-num="3664" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st>?” <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> is <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4170">make war</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>?”<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="846" class="">beast</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> a <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">proud</st> words<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="988" class="">blasphemies</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he was <st data-num="1325" class="">permitted</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="4160" class="">exercise</st> <st data-num="849">ruling authority</st><n id="4" /> for <st data-num="5062" class="">forty</st>-<st data-num="1417">two</st> <st data-num="3376" class="">months</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the beast<n id="2" /> <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="988">blaspheme</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>—to <st data-num="987" class="">blaspheme</st> both <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4633">dwelling place</st>,<n id="3" /> that is, those who <st data-num="4637" class="">dwell</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.

The <st data-num="846" class="">beast</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="1325" class="">permitted</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">go</st> to <st data-num="4171" class="">war</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3528" class="">conquer</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="2" /> He was <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1849">ruling authority</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="5443" class="">tribe</st>, <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1100" class="">language</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> those who <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> will <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">beast</st>,<n id="1" /> everyone <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> has <st data-num="3756">not</st> been <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="575" class="">since</st> the <st data-num="2602" class="">foundation</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="975" class="">book</st> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> belonging to the <st data-num="721" class="">Lamb</st> who was <st data-num="4969" class="">killed</st>.<n id="3" />
If anyone has an ear, he had better listen!

If anyone is meant for captivity,

into captivity he will go.

If anyone is to be killed by the sword,

then by the sword he must be killed.

This requires steadfast endurance and faith from the saints.
Then I saw another beast coming up from the earth. He had two horns like a lamb, but was speaking like a dragon.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">exercised</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">ruling authority</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">behalf</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those who <st data-num="2730" class="">inhabit</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st>, the one <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="2288">lethal</st> <st data-num="4127" class="">wound</st> had been <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st>.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">performed</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">momentous</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">making</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="2597" class="">come down</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">in front of</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="1325" class="">permitted</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">perform</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">behalf</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st>, he <st data-num="4105" class="">deceived</st> those who <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>. He <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st><n id="1" /> those <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> an <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st> to <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> been <st data-num="4127" class="">wounded</st> by <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3162" class="">sword</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> still <st data-num="2198" class="">lived</st>.

The second beast<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="1325" class="">empowered</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">life</st><n id="3" /> to the <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st> of the first <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> it could <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> could <st data-num="4160" class="">cause</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> those who did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> the <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st> of the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> to be <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st>.

<st data-num="4160" class="">He</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">caused</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> (<st data-num="3398">small</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st>, <st data-num="4145" class="">rich</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>, <st data-num="1658" class="">free</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1401">slave</st><n id="2" />) <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">obtain</st> a <st data-num="5480" class="">mark</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3359" class="">forehead</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Thus</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> was <st data-num="1410" class="">allowed</st> to <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4453" class="">sell</st> things<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1487 3361">unless</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">bore</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="5480" class="">mark</st> of the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st>—that is, <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="706" class="">number</st>.<n id="4" />
This calls for wisdom: Let the one who has insight calculate the beast’s number, for it is man’s number, and his number is 666.
